timeline.author: XiangRongLin

timeline.bodyText: I would replace the 18 with "unknown protocol: ".length(). Since on first view i could not see why it was 18
timeline.author: XiangRongLin

replies.bodyText:
I disagree on how to explain what 18 is.
If you do this way, you'll create a String object, call a method; all of that is useless. Just let 18 and add // "unknown protocol".lenght(), you'll understand too and no object is created for nothing
replies.author: B0pol

replies.bodyText: Wouldn't those things be optimized away by the compiler?
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyText: The input parameter shouldn't be reassigned. Especially since with the new checkstyle rules in the NewPipe repo forcing every input parameter to be final.
